item.title: Avengers: Doomsdayâ€™s X-Men Cast Reveals Have Me Incredibly Excited About 1 Inevitable MCU Change
item.description: Marvel has confirmed several classic X-Men stars will return in Doomsday, and we can't wait for them to follow in their predecessors' footsteps.

item.title: 10 Actors Who Quit An Entire Genre
item.description: From action legends who have grown older to child stars ready to try something new, sometimes an actor has just had enough of a particular genre.

item.title: After Marvel's Avengers: Doomsday Cast Reveal, I Understand Why No Original X-Men Were In Deadpool & Wolverine
item.description: The original X-Men cast were notably absent from Deadpool & Wolverine's cameos, and I think Marvel's Avengers: Doomsday stream just revealed why.
